naslov: PRODAJA luksuzna vila sa bazenom, 300 m2, 5 soba, 6 kupaonica (prodaja)
opis: Na prodaju luksuzna vila s bazenom 300 m² – Polača Ova moderna luksuzna vila, izgrađena 2022. godine, smještena u Polači, predstavlja savršenu oazu za odmor i uživanje. Vila je potpuno opremljena i uređena, a nalazi se u mirnoj, šumovitoj okolini. S površinom od 300 m² i okućnicom od 1079 m², nudi vrhunski komfor, privatnost i luksuz. Opis: - Prizemlje: Dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, dvije spavaće sobe s en-suite kupaonicama, prostorija za društvene igre (biljar, stolni nogomet), hodnik, WC, sauna. - Kat: Hodnik, tri spavaće sobe s kupaonicama (jedna s malom garderobom), velika terasa. - Iz prizemlja se izlazi na veliku terasu s ljetnom kuhinjom i kaminom na drva, sunčalište i bazen. - Oko vile je uredna i potpuno ograđena okućnica s dječjim kutkom. Vila je smještena u mirnom, šumovitom okruženju, a idealna je za obiteljsku ili turističku uporabu, nudeći maksimalnu privatnost i udobnost. Cijena i dodatne informacije: - Za sve dodatne informacije, kao i dogovor o razgledavanju, kontaktirajte Vedrana na +385919381007 (WhatsApp/Viber). Ne propustite ovu priliku za kupnju zemljišta u iznimnoj lokaciji! Luxury Villa with Pool 300 m² for Sale – Polača This modern luxury villa, built in 2022, is located in Polača and offers the perfect oasis for relaxation and enjoyment. Fully equipped and furnished, the villa is situated in a peaceful, wooded area. With an area of 300 m² and a plot of 1079 m², it offers top-notch comfort, privacy, and luxury. Description: - Ground floor: Living room with kitchen and dining area, two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, game room (billiards, table football), hallway, WC, sauna. - First floor: Hallway, three bedrooms with bathrooms (one with a small walk-in wardrobe), large terrace. - From the ground floor, you can access the large terrace with a summer kitchen and wood-burning barbecue, sunbathing area, and pool. - The property is surrounded by a well-maintained and fully fenced garden with a children’s corner. The villa is situated in a quiet, wooded environment and is perfect for both family and tourist use, offering maximum privacy and comfort. For more information and to schedule a viewing, please call: Vedran: +385 91 938 1007 Don't miss out on this opportunity!
